requirement_tested: A frontend that fetches all data from backend APIs
user_persona: A new visitor exploring available phone service plans.
user_goal: To view the list of service plans fetched dynamically from the backend.

narrative_steps.title: Visiting the Service Plans Page
narrative_steps.description: Sarah opens the website and clicks on the 'Service Plans' link in the navigation bar to see what options are available.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Service Plans' navigation link.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The page loads and displays a list of service plans retrieved from the backend API endpoint '/api/service-plans'.

requirement_tested: A backend that connects to an external PostgreSQL database using environment variables: DB_HOST=localhost, DB_PORT=5432, DB_USERNAME=myappuser, DB_PASSWORD=myapppassword, DB_NAME=myapp
user_persona: A developer setting up the application locally.
user_goal: To verify that the backend successfully connects to the PostgreSQL database using specified environment variables.

narrative_steps.title: Starting the Backend Server
narrative_steps.description: Alex sets the required environment variables and starts the backend server to ensure it connects to the database.
narrative_steps.action: Run the backend server with correct environment variables set.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The backend initializes successfully and logs a successful connection to the PostgreSQL database at localhost:5432.

user_persona: A potential customer interested in comparing different phone service plans.
user_goal: To browse through various service plans presented in a visually distinct layout.

narrative_steps.title: Landing on the Service Plans Page
narrative_steps.description: Jamie visits the site and navigates to the service plans section to explore available offerings.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the Service Plans page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A grid or list of service plan cards is displayed, each showing name, description, and price with olive drab borders on a light goldenrod background.

narrative_steps.title: Interacting with Plan Cards
narrative_steps.description: Jamie hovers over one of the plan cards to see a subtle elevation effect indicating interactivity.
narrative_steps.action: Hover over a service plan card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The card slightly elevates or changes shade, providing visual feedback.

user_persona: A customer deciding between service plans.
user_goal: To view comprehensive details of a selected service plan.

narrative_steps.title: Selecting a Plan
narrative_steps.description: Taylor sees a service plan they're interested in and clicks on it to learn more.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a service plan card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The detailed view of the selected plan loads, showing full description, features, pricing, and other relevant details.

user_persona: An existing customer needing help with their account.
user_goal: To submit a support ticket through the online tool.

narrative_steps.title: Navigating to Support Page
narrative_steps.description: Jordan goes to the support section to report an issue with their service.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Support' link in the navigation bar.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The support page loads with a form for submitting tickets and a history panel.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting a Ticket
narrative_steps.description: Jordan fills out the subject and message fields and submits the form.
narrative_steps.action: Fill in the support form and click 'Submit Ticket'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A success message appears confirming the ticket has been submitted, and the form resets.

user_persona: An authenticated user updating their contact information.
user_goal: To update their billing address and save the changes.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Account Settings
narrative_steps.description: Casey logs in and navigates to the account management section to update personal details.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Account' link after logging in.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The account settings page loads with editable fields for contact info and payment method.

narrative_steps.title: Updating Information
narrative_steps.description: Casey modifies the billing address field and clicks the save button.
narrative_steps.action: Edit the billing address field and click 'Save'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The updated information is saved successfully, and a confirmation message is shown.

user_persona: A logged-in user checking their registered information.
user_goal: To review their personal profile details securely.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Personal Details
narrative_steps.description: Morgan wants to confirm the phone number associated with their account.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the personal details section from the account menu.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A read-only display of Morgan's full name, date of birth, phone number, and registered email is shown.

requirement_tested: Configure package.json with npm run install:all to install both frontend and backend dependencies
user_persona: A developer setting up the project for the first time.
user_goal: To install all necessary dependencies for both frontend and backend with a single command.

narrative_steps.title: Running Install Script
narrative_steps.description: Riley clones the repository and runs the custom install script to prepare the development environment.
narrative_steps.action: Execute 'npm run install:all' in the terminal.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Dependencies for both frontend and backend are installed successfully without errors.

requirement_tested: Configure package.json with npm run dev to start both frontend and backend concurrently
user_persona: A developer beginning local development work.
user_goal: To launch both the frontend and backend servers simultaneously.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Development Servers
narrative_steps.description: Devon wants to begin working on a feature and needs both servers running.
narrative_steps.action: Run 'npm run dev' from the root directory.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Both the frontend development server and backend Node.js application start concurrently and are accessible.

requirement_tested: Apply light goldenrod color to body backgrounds
user_persona: A designer reviewing the site's visual consistency.
user_goal: To confirm that all pages have a light goldenrod background.

narrative_steps.title: Inspecting Background Color
narrative_steps.description: Taylor inspects the background color of the homepage to ensure brand consistency.
narrative_steps.action: Open the homepage and inspect the body element's background color.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The body background is consistently light goldenrod (#FAFAD2) across all pages visited.

requirement_tested: Apply olive drab color to main components
user_persona: A UI reviewer ensuring design adherence.
user_goal: To verify that main UI components use the specified olive drab color.

narrative_steps.title: Checking Component Styling
narrative_steps.description: Jordan reviews the styling of key components like cards and headers.
narrative_steps.action: Inspect the styles of service plan cards and navigation bar.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Main components such as service plan cards and navigation bars are styled with olive drab (#6B8E23).

user_persona: A user accessing the site on a mobile device.
user_goal: To navigate the site seamlessly on a smartphone.

narrative_steps.title: Resizing Browser Window
narrative_steps.description: Alex resizes the browser window to simulate a mobile screen size.
narrative_steps.action: Resize the browser window to a width below 768px.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Layout adjusts fluidly, reorganizing elements for better readability and interaction on smaller screens.

user_persona: A returning customer accessing their account.
user_goal: To log in and access protected areas of the site.

narrative_steps.title: Logging In
narrative_steps.description: Casey returns to the site and wants to access their account dashboard.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Login' button, enter valid credentials, and click 'Submit'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Casey is redirected to the dashboard, and a session token is stored securely.

narrative_steps.title: Logging Out
narrative_steps.description: After finishing, Casey decides to log out for security.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Logout' button from the account menu.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Session is cleared, and Casey is redirected to the public homepage.

requirement_tested: Secure API endpoints for sensitive data access
user_persona: A security auditor verifying data protection measures.
user_goal: To confirm that sensitive endpoints require proper authentication.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Protected Endpoint Without Token
narrative_steps.description: Audrey attempts to access a user-specific endpoint without being authenticated.
narrative_steps.action: Make a direct request to '/api/user/account' without a valid JWT.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Request is denied with a 401 Unauthorized status, preventing unauthorized access.

requirement_tested: Error handling for API requests and database connections
user_persona: A user experiencing intermittent network issues.
user_goal: To receive helpful feedback when data fails to load.

narrative_steps.title: Encountering Network Failure
narrative_steps.description: While browsing service plans, Sam experiences a sudden loss of internet connectivity.
narrative_steps.action: Simulate a network disconnect while loading the service plans page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: An offline indicator or cached version is displayed with an option to retry once connectivity resumes.
